admin.modtextdesc: Here u can customize the text of your modal popup.
admin.urltextdesc: Paste here the url of your custom image
admin.widthdesc: Set the width of your image (e.g. 450)
admin.heightdesc: Set the height of your image (e.g. 450)
admin.altdesc: Set the "alt" attributes for your image
admin.btn: Customize Button. Syntax example in the placeholder
admin.btndesc: u can setup your fontawesome icon and text for the button

forum.extlinktext: U are leaving the site by clicking on an external link
